title: Carhartt hoodie
text: Great customer service. the lady was so kind and responded right away. My package arrived on time and was in great condition. She even added a heart to the packaging! The vest fits perfect and is pretty clean. And the pricing for the item was great! 100% recommend buying!!

title: 4 large tops
text: All but one fit. All my tops were size large, the long sleeves were the issue for me but other than that everything was beautiful!

title: Dumb
text: Don‚Äôt waste your time on this app. I was permanently blocked after 15 minutes of having the app for no specified reason. I have reached out to customer service and of course they haven‚Äôt responded yet. And after reading other reviews it may be a few days till they get back to me and probably will not help at all. Just a waste of time and I‚Äôm very disappointed. Would rate it a 0 if I could.

title: Never using again!!!
text: For no reason at all Vinted blocked my account when I managed to get a response from customer service they told me to send a screenshot of a bank statement showing my most recent Vinted purchase and I would be allowed access to my account again. I did exactly as they asked but they said it wasn‚Äôt enough and never removed the block. I will never use Vinted again.

title: Extremely poor customer service
text: Extremely poor experience as a seller. Essentially lost a bunch of clothes and their customer service would not do any kind of gesture for the items that I ended up losing (packages were said to be delivered to the buyer by USPS but apparently they did not receive it). I was told to take it to USPS myself, but of course there was nothing they could do. 0 trust in the system

title: Too many bots
text: I used to love vinted. I‚Äôve been a seller for over a year now but I‚Äôm about to delete the app. Everytime I post a bunch of new stuff I get spammed with bots buying my stuff. With usernames like ‚Äúahavdisb‚Äù with no reviews or anything. It happened at least 12 times in less than a day and I cancelled all the orders because I don‚Äôt trust it. They need to control their fake profile/ bots situation before I come back

title: My order
text: I absolutely love everything in my order.  It arrived very quickly too.  I look forward to buying from you again.  Thank youüíï

title: Such a great site!
text: There are so many things that I love about this site! The process is so simple for buying and selling and the layout of the app is easy to navigate. My new favorite selling app!

title: Funtastic!!!!
text: Seller is most gracious!! Terrific deal on my airpod cases and terrific cases I absolutely love each one!! The precious packing, delivery and thank you was all so perfect xoxo! It was truly a great experience and hope to buy again from seller!!! Thank you neighbor lol :) Iraida

title: Coach Crossbody
text: EXCELLENT quality, was shipped immediately and I got it within a few days!  Would definitely recommend and would buy from again!!!!!!!!!

title: Return
text:
I love selling my stuff but I don‚Äôt how they can return my item when they change mind.
Hope can have help for this problem.
Thanks

title: Rebecca Minkoff purse
text: Seller was very responsive. Delivery was not to the pre-determined drop off point- but I received notification and collected successfully (an issue with Vinted shipping and not the seller) color of the bag was more vibrant in person. Thanks!

title: Blocked and No Way To Contact
text: Was sent a message saying that my account had been flagged for suspicious payment activity and was asked to proof of my last purchase and account info but when I tried, it wouldnt send because my account was permanently blocked before the 24 hour mark. No email, number, or anywhere else to contact to try and fix this.

title: Smooth transaction
text: Everything went well, product is conform to description. Thank you!

title: Efficient
text: Buying for the first time, everything was clear and concise and the item had great quality too

title: It‚Äôs convenient to save money
text: I like the idea of buying used/unused products on a discounted price. I like the part that it‚Äôs very convenient to buy/sell and pay using the app.

title: Amazing!
text: This app is absolutely amazing. Great prices, especially shipping prices. I have had way more activity on this app than any other app. I sold 3 things the first day! So glad I found this app! :)

title: Search results limited to your region
text: I browsed Vinted before making an account. Could see loads of stuff from all around Europe but when I made an account (in Romania) the only search results showing are from Romania and Poland . Wish I could select by country / region and also to sell to a wider market than my own country

title: STOP REMOVING MY PHOTOS
text:
I used to love this app due to the no seller fee but I am getting SO tired of y‚Äôall removing photos of ME taken by ME because you think they are copyright infringement. This is getting ridiculous. Please fix whatever system you have that detects this. 
Edit: One star because the customer service people are useless. I‚Äôm done with this app, barely any one uses it anymore anyways after they switched.

title: Great App for Selling & Buying
text: I have been using Vinted to sell clothes for a few years now. Customer service has been great and I have much better luck selling on here rather than Plato‚Äôs Closet.

title: Amazing Items!
text:
Impressive packaging, and quick delivery. 
The items were EXACTLY as described and in great condition. Communication was also a breeze!
Thank you so much! Looking forward to Summer so I can wear my new dress and skirt üíÉüíÉ

title: Multiple items
text: Thank you so much for packing everything with so much care. As I write this I can smell the fragrance from the clothing, which tells me it‚Äôs clean! Thank you!

title: Fast sales and get to keep 100% of the proceeds
text: Tried the app earlier today and already made two sales! Definitely recommend this app!

title: Kids sizing is terrible
text: Why is there one category for sizes 24-36m?! This is a huge range that should not be lumped together. When I want to search for 3t clothes i don't want to weed through 24m and 2T at the same time. 24m/2T/3T are three different sizes and need their own category. Will not use this app for kids clothes bc it takes way too long to read each listing hoping they actually put the real size.

title: I bought the whole closet
text:
I was looking for something specific and when I scrolled to bundle I decided I liked it. All. Lol. 

Efficient shipping and everything was as described. Thank you!

title: Buying
text:
The app is great but since two days I can‚Äôt buy any more I don‚Äôt know what happened 
When I click on buy now I‚Äôm directly oriented to my inbox

title: Made my daughters birthday!!
text: I messaged the seller to ask if she could send out a pair of shoes asap to get here in time for my daughters birthday. She didn‚Äôt have to but she did and they got here just in time! Thank you!!!

title: AMAZING! üòÅüòÅüòÅ
text: Everything was even more beautiful in person!!!!! Items arrived carefully wrapped with a thoughtful thank you note as well!!! I am amazed by and grateful for both the jewelry and the service!

title: Meh
text: There‚Äôs a glitch where you can‚Äôt clear off your notifications even though you checked them, and it drives me insane. Their regular shipping prices are crazy. The deal on shipping right now is great, but when that goes away, it‚Äôs going to go back to ridiculousness.
Sweet seller, easy to communicate with, fast ship and item is as described and very cute. Definitely recommend buying from them ‚ò∫Ô∏è thank you! üñ§

title: I keep getting banned for no reason
text: I‚Äôve tried to make multiple accounts after my first one got banned (I got 5 star ratings from people and still had listings on there as well) and for some reason Vinted IP banned me. I tried to use my bf‚Äôs phone number and his computer and they still knew it was me and blocked me. I am disappointed. I didn‚Äôt do anything wrong at all.

title: Beautiful just as seen!
text: This seller is a very wonderful and truthful seller. He is an epitome of honesty. Fast shipping and delivery. If all sellers are like him, the world would have been a better place. Thank you for the beautiful briefcase bag. I love it.

title: Beautiful shoes!
text: Very happy with my vinted shoes, much nicer than expected. Had some problems with the delivery ( not the sellers fault!) and extremely satisfied now that I finally have my shoes. Thank you very much.

title: Amazing!
text: Amazing seller, she checked in multiple times with me about the status and everything arrived on time. The clothes were also very pretty and in great shape.

title: Nope.
text: Don‚Äôt do it. It‚Äôs not worth it. I‚Äôve managed to buy a few things from this app and have gotten them mailed to me. It worked nicely and the clothes were in great shape!! The app was advertised so beautifully. Until my actual bank account suffered because of the app. I‚Äôm beyond irritated with it and I‚Äôve herd many other stories regarding the app. Save yourself the trouble. Try another app.

title: So many rules/Deleted items/Social Security
text:
I worked really hard uploading my personal items and they were deleted because someone thought I am listing for resale.

I listed thrift store items as well as personal items that I have and everyday something was wrong with them. 

you need to have less rules and have people check with the seller not just assume that items are for resale or that they have large quantities of something 

Also asking for peoples social security number is ridiculous. The better business bureau should investigate.

I will sell elsewhere where sellers are considered to be valuable to their company.

title: Great
text: Item as described, seller was fast. Sorry for the late review (working a lot of shifts,kids, and school). Would recommend and buy from again.

title: Fast & considerate!
text: This great seller sent my items (all just as described) same day or day after, and they were thoughtfully packaged as to avoid breaking. Thank you!!

title: Great app
text: It‚Äôs like depop but cheaper and more affordable! Way less options tho like only a few thousand listings for most of the searches instead of tens of thousands.

title: A great shop
text: Great doing business with your shop.  I am looking forward to doing business with you in the future.  Be well and safe.

title: Terrible
text: Don‚Äôt bother signing up for this app. It is terrible. They remove so many listings for no good reasons. They have too many restrictions.  I wish I would‚Äôve read all the reviews here before signing up for this app. I don‚Äôt understand how it can have a 4.8 rating when it has so many 1 and 2 star ratings.

title: Horrible app!
text: I‚Äôd give zero stars if I could. No seller protection as it is always buyers word against seller. I‚Äôve been using this app for years with continuous problems. Their customer support is total garbage and they never even solve the issue. If you sell on this app, always always always get a receipt from the post office, that‚Äôs the only thing that will save you from losing money.

title: Blocked my account for no reason
text: I barely made an account to sell old clothes and shoes. Posted some authentic shoes i got directly from nike (have receipt for proof) and they blocked my account within 20 minutes of downloading saying they dont condone the selling of inauthentic items. I cant even contact support because im blocked from doing anything on the app. Worst app ive ever downloaded.

title: Shipping Way too High
text: Was a great app until the shipping costs were absurd. A top that costs 5 bucks to ship at the post office is like 7. Have heard more from others. Prices of shipping way too high, sellers have to price their stuff so low to get anybody to buy. Nobody likes this

title: You keep your full selling amount.
text: Unlike poshmark who takes a percentage of your selling. Vinted let‚Äôs you keep all your earning. Only downside is seller and buyer, knows your information such as your address. Wish it was private just for safety reasons.

title: Pretty good
text: It‚Äôs an amazing app to buy and sell things. The only issue is the amount of fake merchandise, there is a lot!! However, it‚Äôs still one of the best apps when it comes to buying and selling.

title: unable to sell anything over 4 pounds
text: their shipping only goes up to 4 pounds which makes sending a bundle impossible. they have a custom shipping option but if you use it, no one is able to buy the item. if you search through their help section, you see they are aware of this issue. why would you allow people to continue using the custom shipping option when you know it doesn‚Äôt work? also, the sizing is all in uk sizing, which is just dumb. they also use british terms for clothes such as vest instead of tank top. seems like very little thought went into the app before releasing it in america.

title: Being a buyer and got blocked
text: I honestly don‚Äôt understand how I got blocked I‚Äôm not a seller so scamming is out of the question I bought a lot of stuff still waiting for the seller to ship and then suddenly got block you guys have already taken the money out of my bank account so I‚Äôm really concern if I ever gonna get stuff or my money or even my account back. This is really unprofessional.

title: Earrings
text: Wonderful seller.  Communication at its finest.   Completely easy to work with.  A must to shop her items you will not be disappointed!

title: Reeked of smoke
text: Fast shipping and everything was in good shape, however, everything reeked of smoke to the point that my son had to use his inhaler because he had an asthma attack. He‚Äôs very sensitive to smoke and I wouldn‚Äôt have made the purchase if I would have known they came from a house that smoked.
